title: Pre-commit test hook for ralphtools
description: Add a pre-commit hook that runs tests on every commit to ralphtools. Tests should validate skill structure, script syntax, and basic functionality. This ensures quality before changes are committed.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Hook runs shellcheck on all .zsh and .sh files
Hook validates JSON files (jq syntax check)
Hook exits non-zero on any test failure (blocks commit)
Add --no-verify bypass documentation for emergency commits
Hook completes in < 10 seconds for fast feedback
